title: Interpretation of silver in a dream - seeing silver in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of silver for a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether a ring, a contract, a purchase, a loss, a broken gold, a ring, or a silver ring by Ibn Sirin, and other things. Interpretation of silver in a dream by Ibn Sirin Silver: If it is made from it like a vessel Or a jewel or the like, broken or whole, and he saw that he was given some of it, then money or things were entrusted to him. Likewise, if it was a silver mirror, it would be enough for him not to look into it. If he sees it in person, he will get what he hates in people. It is not good to look into a silver mirror. The silver shell, if not made, is the essence of a woman, a woman or a slave. If it hits the pit from its metal or from its country, it afflicts a woman from its city. If he sees that he entered a metal cave and breached that hole there, then his wife is deceiving him on her order or on the order of others. Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he has a piece of silver with him, this means that he will marry a very beautiful woman, and if this person Married, this indicates that he will have a very beautiful girl. But if one sees in a dream that he is looking into a mirror made of silver, this means that he will suffer from severe sadness that may affect his family. Seeing silver in a dream Dream interpretation jurists say that if one sees Dreaming that his house is made of silver, this means that this person will obtain a great position and that this person is sick, this indicates that God will heal him, but if the person sees that the walls of the house are plated with silver, this indicates that it is abundant sustenance that the person will receive Interpretation of extracting silver in a dream. If one sees in a dream that he is making a large amount of silver, this means that this person will obtain a lot of money and his wife. Interpretation of silver coins in a dream. If one sees in his dream that he owns silver money whose source he does not know, this means that this The person keeps a big secret or this person keeps it safe from people and does not return it. Interpretation of silver in an unmarried woman’s dreamDream Interpretation lawyers say that seeing silver in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will receive great benefit from one of her relatives, and she will get a silver ring, which indicates However, she will get married soon. Interpretation of silver in a dream for a married woman: Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing silver in a married woman’s dream portends a lot of goodness, as if she sees her husband giving her a silver ring, as this indicates that she will become pregnant soon and the baby will be a girl, since silver in a dream is a beautiful girl and a female. Or seeing gold indicates pregnancy with a boy. Interpretation of a silver ring - YouTube. Interpretation of seeing gold and silver in a dream - YouTube.

title: Learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a white snake

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white snake: A snake can be defined as one of the frightening reptiles that can kill a person if it bites it, so seeing it in a dream carries a bad omen. However, its sometimes appearance in white can indicate praiseworthy meanings for the viewer, and these meanings vary according to the social and psychological situation. And sex. The following are the most important interpretations of a dream about a white snake in all cases. Stay tuned. Interpretation of a dream about a white snake by Ibn Sirinama. Interpretation of a dream about a white snake? Dream interpretation scholars have agreed that seeing a white snake in a dream symbolizes the enemies that are hiding in the dreamer in reality, but in the end he will defeat them and they will become sick and weak. Seeing a white snake is most often considered a good vision for its owner. The entry of a snake into the house indicates that there is a close person who is characterized by malice and cunning and is trying to get the fortuneteller into a lot of trouble. If the dreamer is bitten by a white snake on his right hand, this indicates an abundance of money. And the great livelihood that he will gain soon, while the bite, if it is on the left hand, indicates a large number of sins and wrongdoing. The path of corruption. Watching someone get his head bitten by a white snake reflects the many psychological pressures and trials he is going through, resulting from haste in making fatal decisions before thinking rationally. If the snake is wrapped around the dreamer’s body, this indicates that in reality he is surrounded by bad company. She pushes him to walk on the forbidden path, and the dream is a warning to the dreamer of the need to stay away from her and avoid their friendship. Seeing a white snake and killing it in a dream portends relief after distress and comfort after hardship, and indicates the fulfillment of desires, the fulfillment of what is desired, and victory over haters. Scientists have interpreted the man’s testimony that his wife will give birth A white snake is considered a bad omen that will lead to the birth of a disobedient child, while the presence of a white snake in the marital bed is an unpleasant sign of the approaching death of a life partner. . Interpretation of a dream about a white snake by Ibn Sirin. When we searched for the interpretation of the appearance of a white snake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, we found that it is good news for the disappearance of worries, freedom from anxiety, and ease of circumstances, while in a woman’s dream it indicates a new offspring. Of children, it is also considered evidence of an imminent marriage if the dreamer is single. For the seeker of knowledge, this dream can be interpreted as an indication of his extreme diligence in science and knowledge and his pursuit of achieving goals and reaching the top. If the snake appears white in the prisoner’s dream, it symbolizes innocence. And freedom. As for the dream of a traveler, it indicates the imminent return to the homeland. Whoever suffers from an illness and sees a dream of a white snake, this is a sign of recovery, improvement in physical condition, and freedom from illness. If a white snake approaches a person who bites him, this indicates the presence of a malicious and cunning woman in his life and on him. To beware of it. If one sees in a dream that he has a white snake, this is a sign of the abundant goodness that he will achieve in the future, whether it is the money that he will earn or that he will have

If a person sees in a dream that he has a white snake, this is a sign of the abundant good that he will achieve in the future, whether it is the money he will earn or that he will have

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an old woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an old woman: Seeing an old man in a dream carries many signs, perhaps good or bad, as many scholars differ on this matter, and some believe that seeing an old man is not just a serious illness that afflicts the dreamer and perhaps the loss of money or a child, and seeing an old woman is a matter Bad in a dream sins. And the great sins that the dreamer has committed and must return to God, and the old woman is bad, and in other places there is good news about the imminent release and cessation of pain and sadness from the dreamer and from his home. Interpretation of seeing the old woman in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained seeing the old man in a dream about the changes The many things that happen in a person's life whether good or bad. Also, the poor old man in a dream has praiseworthy transformations and abundant money coming to the dreamer, and in a dream the patient may indicate the approach of healing and comfort from a close distance. Seeing a married woman about the old woman in a dream It reflects the existing problems and differences with her husband and the death of the old woman, which portends the disappearance of problems and worries, family stability and psychological stability by God’s will. Old women in a dream have a weak character and their inability to bear the difficult responsibilities of life, and an old illness may indicate weak money. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that The transformation of an old woman into a young woman is nothing but good changes in the dreamer's life and a life of praise. Details: In a trader’s dream, an old woman indicates optimism in life and successful trade. Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream for a single woman. In a dream, the old woman explains the abundance of goodness and happiness that God’s command has given her. An old woman entering a single woman’s house in a dream is nothing but good news for a close marriage. And the stable life that she gets while studying or working. An unmarried woman seeing an old woman is a feeling of loneliness and a reflection of the girl’s bad psychological state in reality. The interpretation of seeing an old woman in a married dream. Seeing an old woman in a dream of a married woman who has good offspring that she received from God Almighty is also interpreted from By seeing the disappearance of the fears and problems that she faced during this period. In some places we see that a married woman turning into an old woman in a dream is nothing but fear of the unknown and concern for her beauty and elegance in reality. The inability of a married woman to conceive brings pregnancy and happiness to her and her family, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an old woman Pregnant in a dream. Dream scholars explain seeing an old woman in a pregnant woman’s dream with the situation that is approaching for her and the safety of her fetus, by God’s command. Also, the old woman is ugly and unfaithful to the dreams of a pregnant woman during pregnancy and childbirth and can harm the fetus. Seeing an old man in a married and single dream A married man may see a woman An old man in his dream, and this vision warns him of a serious illness and difficult financial crises, and the death of an old man may indicate his neglect, God willing. An old woman in a dream is nothing but a successful job and a blessed life in it, as Imam Al-Sadiq explained that the old man

title: Interpretation of a dream about crumpled in a dream

preview.html: Between the lines of this article, we will enter the discussion and provide all the information related to the interpretation of seeing a shrinking woman in a dream and its meaning. During the article you will learn about the interpretation for all categories of people, and you will also learn about the interpretation of the dream for men, women and single people, and many other information related to this topic. Continue to learn more. Interpretation of seeing a crumpled tree in a dream and its meaning. Evidence of victory over enemies, and God knows best. Seeing a crumpled tree in a man’s dream if he sees The dreamer sees the hood of a car as if he is approaching his window, then this is a sign of the presence of a just wife. Seeing a mullet slaughtered in a dream. This dream indicates the imminence of marriage and loss of virginity, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a shrunken woman in a dream and its meaning. In this paragraph you will learn about the interpretation of seeing a shrunken woman in a dream and its meaning. They are as follows: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a masked person in a dream with a feeling of fear is evidence that the action he is taking has failed, and God knows best. Standing on top of a building in a dream is evidence that this building will be demolished. In addition to that The brown tsalapetino in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety and the end of heartache, and God knows best. Seeing tsalapetino in a dream may mean that someone has been reported for his bad qualities. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi: Seeing tsalapetino in a dream indicates a person’s closeness to the king or his importance, and God knows best. Seeing a crumpled person in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s honesty and sincerity in speaking. In addition, seeing a crumpled person can be evidence that the person is talking and having a lot of arguments, or it can indicate a spy person. As for hearing a rattling sound in a dream, this is evidence of news. Happy is close to the dreamer, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a donkey in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dream about a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a shrinking woman in a dream and its meaning for a pregnant woman is evidence of luck and success, and God knows best. A dream about a pregnant woman also indicates the birth of a male. In addition to that, seeing a shrinking woman in a dream Evidence that what you dream of and desire to obtain will come true, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a white, curly one. If the color of the two salabitas is white in the dream, this indicates the proximity of goodness to the dreamer, and God knows best. But if you chase a white, curly one in a dream, this indicates a deterioration in his financial situation. Also, trapping a white sandbird in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many financial losses, and God knows best. You may also be interested in knowing: Mirrors in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a bird collapsing in a dream and its meaning for a single woman. As for the interpretation of seeing a bird collapsing in a dream and its meaning for an unmarried girl, this indicates On an honest man who is also distinguished by his good morals and kindness, and the broken one can indicate a teacher, in addition to seeing good visions here in the year, and God knows best. Also, seeing a wrinkle on the shoulder of an unmarried girl is a sign of good luck and obtaining a lot of money and livelihood, But if the wrinkle stands on the window, this is evidence of a lot of good news for the girl.vision

title: Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Holy Kaaba in a dream for a single woman. We all dream and want to visit the Sacred House of God to perform Hajj or Umrah rituals and see the Kaaba. This is a holy place and all Muslims try to reach and pray, so when a person dreams and sees the Kaaba in his sleep, he is very happy because he saw it, and because this vision is good. For a lot of goodness and peace of mind, many seek to know the meaning and interpretation of these dreams. In which the Holy Kaaba appears, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the Holy Kaaba in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba in a dream without a curtainSeeing the Holy Kaaba without a curtain in a dream has many indications and interpretations, depending on the situation in which the dreamer saw the Holy Kaaba In a dream. He does not hold any rank or position. The vision can be a warning from God and a reminder to draw closer to God Almighty, increase His good deeds, and stay away from what He has forbidden. Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba from the insideIf the dreamer sees the Kaaba in his dream from the inside and his health is good and he is single, then this may be a sign of his approaching marriage, but if he sees The sick person dreams that he entered the Kaaba, and this may be a sign of his approaching death. Interpretation of seeing the Holy Kaaba for an unmarried woman: Seeing the Holy Kaaba in an unmarried girl’s dream is good news and evidence that her wishes will come true, God willing. While the scenes of standing at the Kaaba in a dream may It indicates that God Almighty will respond to prayers. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is entering the Kaaba, this is evidence that she will marry a prominent man who may be a scholar, preacher, jurist, ruler, or wealthy person. Seeing an unmarried girl covering the Kaaba in a dream is evidence of her purity, honor, and humility. While if an unmarried girl sees the Kaaba in her home in a dream, this vision shows the girl’s sincerity and devotion. Interpretation of seeing the Holy Kaaba for a married woman. Seeing the Holy Kaaba in a married woman’s dream is a good sign and good news from God Almighty that her wishes will come true. This vision may mean that a married woman She will become pregnant soon or she will succeed in her life in general and be blessed with happiness. For a married woman, seeing the Kaaba may mean that she is always seeking to get closer to God through worship and obedience and staying away from sins. Seeing the honorable covering of the Kaaba means that she is blessed with money, children, and good news, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba for a pregnant woman: Seeing the Holy Kaaba in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good sign and good news from God that she will give birth to the child she desires and be in good health, and that God Almighty will answer her prayers and fulfill her desires. Larger. And He knows best. In conclusion, when a Muslim dreams of seeing the Kaaba, he is one of the happiest and happiest people and tries with all his energy to achieve this vision.

title: Interpretation of a dream about drawing eyes using black eyeliner in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of drawing an eye in a dream for a single woman: If a single girl sees in her dream that she is drawing black eyeliner on her eyes. This is evidence of her nourishment in life, she has been waiting for a long time. What if she dreams that she is drawing again for a woman, because this is evidence that she has obtained the most things What she wanted in her life and that the time was not right for her to get this thing. Seeing an unmarried, cool woman in her dream is evidence of the goodness that she will obtain. The evidence of her good husband is near and her marriage. But if he sees an unmarried woman, she paints her left eye with kohl. This is an indication of the future goodness of her husband, who He will get it. A sign of her happiness with him. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is putting eyeliner in her eyes, then this is convincing evidence of her husband’s kindness and provision for her. But when she sees what he is wearing as black eyeliner, this in her daughter’s eyes is evidence of her daughter’s marriage to a pious man. Fear God, protect her daughter, and protect her. When a married woman sees Kol in a dream, it shows the good that she will receive. She will know where this food came from and its source. But if her condition is not good, then seeing Kol is a sign that her condition has changed from worse to better and she enjoys healthy Good and beautiful life. Drawing eyes with black eyeliner for a girl. title: Interpretation of intercourse with the husband in a dream and intercourse with the husband in a dream

preview.html: I dream of my husband marrying a married woman, a pregnant woman, adultery with someone other than my husband or with my husband, modesty, a lover, a preacher, or a brother, Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. This indicates that your marital life is in the best condition, but there is a secret in the heart of each of you and you are afraid to reveal it to the other. It means that you have something to fear and you are married, which means distrust of each other, so there must be a peace session between them. The dream of intercourse with the husband is considered a normal and ordinary dream that reflects something from your personal life and the private intimate habits between you. If you and your husband have not had sex for a while, the dream inevitably reflects your desire for an active sexual life with him. It also reflects your restricted affection and longing for him. Therefore, we advise you to search with him for a solution to get rid of this frozen desire inside you and get your right to affection and tenderness. If you see yourself having sex with your husband and you are happy about it, this symbolizes a happy and happy marital life. If you dream that you had sex with your husband but you were disturbed and anxious, this reflects your disturbance in reality and that you have a problem that bothers you and you need to tell your husband about it in order to improve the relationship. The dreamer who sees himself having intercourse with his husband, this indicates the emergence of goodness and benefit in life. The fortune teller who sees semen coming out of the female’s belly indicates profit and sustenance from lawful money. The priest who sees himself having intercourse with this husband that this is what he wants and will indeed get for him. The dreamer who sees her having intercourse with her husband may indicate that she will be promoted in a job and work, or obtain a sensitive position or successful work. The dreamer who sees himself having intercourse with his husband from the anus, this indicates striving for something that is difficult to achieve and happen, which causes fatigue and exhaustion in life. It is said that this dream indicates a lack of interest in the path of God and faith and the fact that the dreamer is a person far from the Sunnah of God. The dreamer who sees himself having intercourse with his wife while he is already dead, this dream is not good and there is no good in it. If the fortune teller is sick, it indicates death. If the viewer is rich, this indicates poverty and entering into a losing trade or useless financial transactions. The dreamer who sees his wife dead and then returns to life and has intercourse with her and is injured from her water indicates that a lot of money is spent on things that he is exposed to in life. The dreamer who sees his wife kissing him passionately or asking her to have sex indicates that there is good news and good news in his life. The dream may indicate achieving financial gains and profits or solving some problems that caused him anxiety. Interpretation of sexual dreams - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying someone she knows?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying someone she knows: Marriage is what matters most to a single woman, and her romantic thoughts about her life partner turn into visions that she experiences during sleep, and she wakes up with a great desire to know what these dreams indicate, and she also hopes to find in the interpretations for her someone regarding the date of her upcoming wedding or Advice to guide her to do the right thing in her love life. Does the dream carry meanings that satisfy or contradict her expectations? What is the interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying someone she knows? Wedding dreams are not just romantic fantasies as some believe! On the contrary, it sometimes contains very ambiguous facts, and the following are the three most curious indicators about it: First dream: An unmarried girl sees herself getting married to a man she knows but he is not of the same religion, and this indicates the absence of some acts of worship. And God will respond to him in a beautiful response with this warning to wake her up from the neglect that has befallen her recently. The second dream: The marriage of an unmarried woman to an old man, despite her young age, is evidence of the stability of her emotional state and the agreement of her mind with her heart in many matters. It also indicates that she will marry a man. Healthy and balanced. The third dream: The absence of the groom in the vision and hearing his voice only indicates her connection to this person, but the engagement will not be completed, so she has to think a lot before making any decision about her approval of this marriage. There are also four positive interpretations of this dream: In general , indicates the imminent marriage of this single woman, but it is not required that the marriage be with the same person whom the girl dreamed of, but the vision is correct and portends a connection in the near future. This dream is good news and signs of goodness, and whoever dreams of it will be pleased with the restoration of God Almighty’s mind, but It is necessary to be patient, no matter how late it is, it is a great reward. About any harm that befalls her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is marrying someone she knows but is sad, this means that she is facing some difficulties and is consuming more of her energy, but these fears are about to end and she just needs to relieve her psychological pressure. He now spends practicing sports or favorite hobbies. Marrying a well-known person in a dream expresses the girl’s ambition and big dreams, and it is also good news that she will be able to realize her dreams in reality and that her efforts in the current period to achieve these aspirations will achieve amazing success. Result. What is the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman marrying someone she knows according to Ibn Sirin? Single people are often happy in a dream when they marry someone they know, so how does this happiness transfer from dream to reality? This is what the great scholar Ibn Sirin tells us, where happiness moves from a dream to reality in four ways: (good news, response to an invitation, success, happy news). As for the man, it is a message urging her to wait for the blessings and goodness that will come her way and that she will fly with joy in the coming days. Because marriage is a happy event, and therefore a dream about it portends happiness, even if she is experiencing a difficult period or is accumulating distress

title: Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream: Seeing nuts in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Eating peanuts for an unmarried girl, for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, by Ibn Sirin, eating peanuts, cooked beans. Eating peanuts in a dream The interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream is the same as the interpretation of seeing plants, fruits, or grains, especially if This plant was a legume. Seeing peanuts in a dream is considered a promising sign and calls for optimism, because it portends good food, livelihood, and money. The more peanuts the fortuneteller eats, the more money he will make, and vice versa. One pistachio heralds a year full of goodness, food, and blessings, as does seeing a pistachio tree, its leaves, or its plants. Buying peanuts in a dream Buying peanuts in a dream is news of kindness and strength, or something coming that the dreamer will obtain many benefits and livelihood, and it may indicate work or something related to studies, trade, or travel. And seeing buying peanuts in the dream of an unmarried girl It is good news about a happy event near her, which could be related to an emotional or practical issue. Planting peanuts in a dream. As for seeing peanuts growing in a dream, whoever dreams of having agricultural land and growing peanuts on it, then this predicts a trip to a foreign country or trade. An agreement with a stranger will bring him many benefits. And her livelihood, and seeing a pistachio tree in a married woman’s dream indicates good children, if the tree is green and prosperous. As for a married woman who sees herself in her dream picking peanuts, this bodes well for the success of her children in life, whether the next step for them is studying. Or travel, work, or marriage. Welfare and protection, God willing, distributing peanuts in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that someone gives him peanuts and eats what he gets, this foretells his marriage that year, whether he is unmarried or an unmarried girl. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is giving peanuts to others, this foretells that It indicates blessed and poor money among them, and a lot of charity and work or knowledge that benefits him, and his fame spreads among men. Peanuts in a woman’s dreamWith regard to the interpretation of seeing peanuts in a woman’s dream, seeing peanuts in an unmarried woman’s dream means a happy event or news soon. Or fulfill a wish dear to her. , bodes well for money or food. Sudanese in a pregnant woman’s dream is natural news about birth and death from pain and problems, God willing. Seeing beans in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he is eating beans in a dream, whether they are wet beans or sprouted beans, then this matter indicates many worries and horrors. Cooking beans in a dream, if he sees it To the dreamer, it portends evil. Even if the dreamer does not cook the beans, it is considered bad, and in both cases, whether they are cooked or uncooked, this indicates something that is not good. Green beans in a dream indicate purity and money, if the woman is the dreamer and she sees fate.

title: Interpretation of a dream about healing a paralyzed person

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about healing a paralytic. There are many symbols in a dream whose effects the dreamer does not know on him in reality. These are symbols related to the psychological, professional, religious, or social aspects that scientists are trying to interpret, but God alone knows what is unseen, and they vary among the symbols that indicate On things that deserve praise and others that indicate undesirable things, and seeing recovery from illness in a dream is one of the visions that the dreamer feels portends goodness, and among visions of recovery is recovery from paralysis, and in the following are lines from an encyclopedia that you can learn about the meaning of this dream: Scientists interpreted the vision Recovering from paralysis in a dream as a sign of overcoming the difficulties he suffered in reality. Interpretation scholars also reported that recovering from paralysis in a dream indicates that the dreamer will correct his course in reality. This vision also has another praiseworthy sign, it indicates repayment. Religion in reality. If the dreamer sees healing in a dream without his hands, this indicates that the dreamer does not extend a helping hand to those in need. In general, seeing healing in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the arrival of good news to the dreamer. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of healing from paralysis Without the fingers of his hand as an indication that the dreamer is going through a financial crisis in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a man recovering from paralysis. Seeing a man recovering from paralysis in a dream means that the dreamer will make a lot of profits in reality. This dream is also good news for the dreamer that he will recover from illness if he is sick. In reality. As for the meaning of this vision for the married dreamer, it indicates the return of his marital life to stability, and God knows best. Interpretation of recovery from paralysis in a dream for a single woman. Seeing recovery from paralysis in a dream means that she has overcome the obstacles she faces in her life. If the dreamer is sick in reality This vision is a sign of her recovery from illness in reality, and God knows best. Also, seeing recovery from paralysis in a dream symbolizes that she is going through positive changes in her life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream a familiar person who has recovered from paralysis, this means that good news will reach her. Interpretation of recovery from paralysis in a dream for a married woman: If the dreamer sees in a dream a husband who has recovered from paralysis, this is an indication that he is going through a financial crisis. Seeing recovery from paralysis in a dream means that she will go through positive changes in her marital life. One of the good connotations of this vision is that it indicates sustenance from Childbearing, and God knows best. If the dreamer is paralyzed in a dream, this indicates that he is going through a financial crisis in reality. In the case of paralysis after her recovery, this indicates that there are those who wish her illness in reality. Interpretation of a dream about treating a paralyzed pregnant woman. Seeing recovery from paralysis in a dream It indicates the difficulties that she faces during pregnancy. Also, dreaming of recovering from paralysis indicates an easy birth, as well as good livelihood and abundance for the pregnant woman. In the event that she sees her husband recovering in a dream, this indicates the emergence of positive changes in her life. Interpretation of treatment for absolute paralysis
